Package weka.distributed.spark

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArffHeaderSparkJob
    A Spark job for creating a unified ARFF header (including summary "meta" attributes).
    ArffHeaderSparkJobBeanInfo
    BeanInfo class for the ArffHeaderSparkJob
    CachingStrategy
    Implements a caching strategy based on available cluster memory and size of input on disk.
    CanopyClustererSparkJob
    Spark job for training a Canopy clusterer
    CorrelationMatrixSparkJob
    Spark job for constructing a correlation matrix.
    CorrelationMatrixSparkJobBeanInfo
    BeanInfo class for the CorrelationMatrixSparkJob
    CSVToInstanceFlatMapFunction
    A flat map function to convert CSV string data into Instances
    CSVToInstancePairFlatMapFunction  
    Dataset
    Class that encapsulates dataset information - i.e.
    IntegerKeyPartitioner
    A simple partitioner that partitions according to the key
    KMeansClustererSparkJob
    Spark job for training a k-means clusterer with or without the k-means++ (kmeans||) initialization procedure
    KMeansClustererSparkJobBeanInfo
    BeanInfo class for the KMeansClustererSparkJob
    RandomizedDataSparkJob
    Job for creating randomly shuffled (and stratified if a nominal class is set) RDDs.
    RandomizedDataSparkJobBeanInfo
    BeanInfo class for the RandomizedDataSparkJob
    SparkJob
    Abstract base class for Spark jobs.
    SparkJob.NoKeyTextOutputFormat<K,V>
    Subclass of TextOutputFormat that does not write the key.
    SparkJobBeanInfo  
    WekaClassifierEvaluationSparkJob
    Spark job for running an evaluation of a classifier or a regressor.
    WekaClassifierEvaluationSparkJobBeanInfo  
    WekaClassifierSparkJob
    Job for building a classifier in Spark.
    WekaClassifierSparkJobBeanInfo
    BeanInfo class for the WekaClassifierSparkJob
    WekaScoringSparkJob
    Spark job for scoring new data using an existing Weka classifier or clusterer model.
    WekaScoringSparkJobBeanInfo
